```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, include = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(bigrquery)
library(DBI)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
con <- dbConnect(bigquery(), project = "tonofshell-analyses")

zillow_pricing_table <-  tbl(con, "tonofshell-analyses.housing_price_analysis.zillow_prices_by_zip")
covid_mobilty_table <- tbl(con, "bigquery-public-data.covid19_google_mobility.mobility_report")
zip_to_county_table <- tbl(con, "bigquery-public-data.hud_zipcode_crosswalk.zip_to_county")
census_acs_2018_table <- tbl(con, "bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_acs.zip_codes_2018_5yr")
```

```{r}
zillow_pricing_table %>% 
  group_by(date, state) %>% 
  summarise(min_price = min(price, na.rm = TRUE),
            med_price = quantile(price, 0.5, na.rm = TRUE),
            max_price = max(price, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  collect() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, color = state)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = med_price))
```

zillow_price_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(price)) %>%
